On February 23, 1972, respondent filed a motion for an order to show cause, pursuant to Rule 31(b)(5) *60  of the Court's Rules of Practice, why the facts and evidence recited in his proposed stipulation of facts attached to the motion should not be accepted as established for the purposes of this case. On February 24, 1972, the Court entered an Order to Show Cause which was served on petitioners' counsel.
